attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have more control over the selling of alcohol from small shops, small,off linces, supermarkets, stores in built up areas, council estates where there are teenages causing proplems i.e. anti-social behaviour. Withdraw alcohol licences immediately in a vacinty of 2.5 miles of known hotspots

rejection.details: The main sentence doesn't fit into the introductory text. Please redraft.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
